oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Burl Ives Show - 1947-07-11
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Mutual Broadcasting System radio program The Burl Ives Show, originally broadcast 1947-07-11. Sponsored by Philco; produced and transcribed in Hollywood.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Burl Ives
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer opening statement -- Opening theme (Blue Tail Fly) -- Hey Liley, Liley Lo (Burl Ives) -- Burl Ives talks -- Foggy, Foggy Dew (Burl Ives) -- Burl Ives talks -- Brennan On The Moor (Burl Ives) -- Burl Ives talks -- You Are My Sunshine (Burl Ives) -- Burl Ives talks -- I'm Goin' Down The Road (Burl Ives) -- Wayfaring Stranger (Burl Ives) -- Announcer closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mutual Broadcasting System; Ives, Burl, 1909-1995
